Package io.github.ai4ci.functions

Interface FixedValueFunction

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable, SimpleFunction
@Immutable public interface FixedValueFunction extends Serializable, SimpleFunction
A simple function that always returns a fixed value.

This interface describes a simple function that always returns the same value regardless of the input. It is used as a baseline or default in cases where a more complex function is not required. For example, it may be used as a default contact odds function in demographic configurations or as a simple parameter function in execution configurations.

Downstream uses include demographic and execution configuration code such as AgeStratifiedDemography and ExecutionConfiguration.

Author:
Rob Challen

  • Method Details

    • of

      static FixedValueFunction of(double value)
      Creates a fixed value function that always returns the specified value.

      This factory method allows you to create a fixed value function with any specified value. It may be used as a simple parameter function in various configurations where a constant value is sufficient.

      Parameters:
      value - the fixed value to be returned by the function
      Returns:
      a fixed value function that always returns the specified value

    • ofOne

      static FixedValueFunction ofOne()
      Creates a fixed value function that always returns 1.

      This is a convenient factory method for creating a simple fixed value function with a default value of 1. It may be used as a default contact odds function or as a simple parameter function in various configurations.

      Returns:
      a fixed value function that always returns 1

    • getValue

      double getValue()
      The fixed value returned by this function.

      This value is returned by the value(double) method regardless of the input. It is set at construction and may be used as a simple parameter or default function in various configurations.

      Returns:
      the fixed value returned by this function

    • value

      default double value(double x)
      Returns the fixed value of this function.

      This method ignores the input and always returns the value specified by getValue(). It provides a simple implementation of the SimpleFunction interface.

      Specified by:
      value in interface SimpleFunction
      Parameters:
      x - the input value
      Returns:
      the function value at x
